Hi, welcome to the Nouns Arcade!
You've been given 30G to start with.
The goal is to win as much G as possible!
Once you're happy with the amount you've won,
go to the bulletin board to register your
high score. If it's the highest score by the
end of the day, you get a special badge!
Oh, and there are three games to play.
Slot machine, coin flip, and high/low.
What's your high score? Mine is pretty high!
I just lost all my G...
Your score is \V[228] G. Do you want to log your score?
Okay, your score has been logged as \N[5] !
Okay, keep playing and good luck!
I'm relaxing after playing games for hours...

Welcome to the arcade! In Nouns Game, you get
Gold for participating in governance. The gold
can be used (along with the 30 G you receive
every time you log in) to play games here.
Right now, you can play three different games,
with more games on the way.
You can use the Gold to win more Gold, and
once you have a good high score, you can log
Great, that's everything! Let's go outside.
You need to play atleast one game! Go over to
any of the three game tables and place a bet.
